statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); dir_display=$(echo "$cwd" | awk -F/ '{if (NF>2) print $(NF-1)"/"$NF; else print $0}'); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); [ -z "$branch" ] && branch=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); git_status=""; (git -C "$cwd" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -C "$cwd" diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null) || git_status="*"; git_info=" (${branch}${git_status})"; fi; status_line=$(printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m" "$model"); [ -n "$remaining" ] && status_line="${status_line}$(printf " \033[33m[ctx: %.0f%%]\033[0m" "$remaining")"; status_line="${status_line}$(printf " \033[32m%s\033[0m" "$dir_display")"; [ -n "$git_info" ] && status_line="${status_line}$(printf "\033[35m%s\033[0m" "$git_info")"; echo "$status_line"
